snippet: BMW North America and Mercedes-Benz USA withheld year-end sales results until late Thursday morning, as each tried to become the top-selling luxury brand in the country. BMW prevailed by a narrow margin.
abstract: BMW North America and Mercedes-Benz USA withheld year-end sales results until late Thursday morning, as each tried to become the top-selling luxury brand in the country. BMW prevailed by a narrow margin.
lead_paragraph: In which we bring you motoring news from around the Web:

headline.main: Wheelies: The Clash of the Teutons Edition
